name: Rogan Josh
description: A signature slow-cooked lamb curry famous for its vibrant red color derived from Kashmiri chilies and its rich, aromatic flavor enhanced by yogurt and traditional spices.

name: Yakhni
description: A fragrant and mild curry made with tender mutton cooked in a yogurt-based gravy flavored with fennel seeds, dry ginger, and subtle spices.

name: Dum Aloo
description: Baby potatoes that are deep-fried and then simmered in a spicy, tangy yogurt gravy, creating a comforting and flavorful vegetarian dish.

name: Gushtaba
description: Large, soft mutton meatballs cooked in a creamy yogurt-based sauce, traditionally served as the final and most prestigious dish of the Kashmiri Wazwan feast.

name: Modur Pulao
description: A sweet and festive rice preparation cooked with saffron, milk, sugar, ghee, and dry fruits, often served during celebrations and special occasions.

name: Kahwa
description: A traditional aromatic green tea infused with saffron, cardamom, and cinnamon, garnished with almonds, and commonly served as a welcome drink in Kashmir.
